title: Re: Going To Movies..
content: I just saw Apocalypto last night. It wasn't what I expected, but it was still a great movie (with the exception of the jaguar that looked like a stuffed animal).

title: Re: Going To Movies..
content:
I just saw the new Bond. It was ok, but I missed all those crazy gadgets he has had. Great stunts, especially in the beginning.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: MOVAY
content:
Aye, quite a classy movie. Though rather strange for a Bond movie. Saw it for the first time in Village Gold Class at Crown Casino the other day. Quite overrated if you ask me. Sure, reclining seats is a novelty, but the screen was rather small and the snobbish looking old people sitting next to us were noisy and creepy. I think I'll just buy my own.

Apparently Deja Vu is good. A friend was telling me about it today. I'll probably watch it during my travels in the next two weeks. I'm looking forward to Hannibal Rising, too.

ROFL. I just had to rewrite this message because I thought I did something stupid--it disappeared into a blank Post page. Apparently I pressed Ctrl+Tab.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]
